data: Well and truly an inspired mind has written, “One man in his time plays many parts,” but surely no other man ever played so many parts in the course of a single existence as I have.
The Wonderful Adventures of Phra the Phoenician
Arnold, Edwin Lester, 1857-1935; Arnold, Edwin, Sir, 1832-1904 [Author of introduction, etc.]; Paget, H. M. (Henry Marriott), 1857-1936 [Illustrator]
